import { Meta, Story, Preview, Props } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import { action } from '@storybook/addon-actions';

import Slideshow from './Slideshow';

<Meta title="Components/Slideshow" />

# Slideshow

## Single images

<Preview>
  <Story name="Slideshow Single Horizontal">
    <Slideshow
      backgColor={null}
      fullSize={true}
      images= {[
        {"backgImageEnabled": true, "caption":"Horizontal Image","name":"/image-h.png","order":1,"base":"/image-h.png","childImageSharp":{"resize":{"originalName":"/image-h.png","src":"/image-h.png"},"fluid":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","aspectRatio":1.775,"src":"/image-h.png","srcSet":"/image-h.png 355w,\n/image-h.png 710w,\n/image-h.png 1420w,\n/image-h.png 1920w","sizes":"(max-width: 1420px) 100vw, 1420px"},"fixed":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","width":1420,"height":800,"src":"/image-h.png","srcSet":"/image-h.png 1x"}},"publicURL":"/image-h.png"},
      ]}
      maskColor="rgba(255,255,255,0.75)"
      textColor="#000000"
    />
  </Story>
</Preview>

<Preview>
  <Story name="Slideshow Single Vertical">
    <Slideshow
      backgColor={null}
      fullSize={true}
      images= {[
        {"backgImageEnabled": true, "caption":"Vertical Image","name":"/image-v.png","order":2,"base":"/image-v.png","childImageSharp":{"resize":{"originalName":"/image-v.png","src":"/image-v.png"},"fluid":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","aspectRatio":0.565,"src":"/image-v.png","srcSet":"/image-v.png 113w,\n/image-v.png 225w,\n/image-v.png 451w,\n/image-v.png 676w,\n/image-v.png 902w,\n/image-v.png 1082w","sizes":"(max-width: 451px) 100vw, 451px"},"fixed":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","width":451,"height":800,"src":"/image-v.png","srcSet":"/image-v.png 1x,\n/image-v.png 1.5x,\n/image-v.png 2x"}},"publicURL":"v.png"}
      ]}
      maskColor="rgba(255,255,255,0.75)"
      textColor="#000000"
    />
  </Story>
</Preview>

## Multiple images

<Preview>
  <Story name="Slideshow Multiple">
    <Slideshow
      backgColor={null}
      fullSize={null}
      images= {[
        {"backgImageEnabled": true, "caption":"Horizontal Image","name":"/image-h.png","order":1,"base":"/image-h.png","childImageSharp":{"resize":{"originalName":"/image-h.png","src":"/image-h.png"},"fluid":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","aspectRatio":1.775,"src":"/image-h.png","srcSet":"/image-h.png 355w,\n/image-h.png 710w,\n/image-h.png 1420w,\n/image-h.png 1920w","sizes":"(max-width: 1420px) 100vw, 1420px"},"fixed":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","width":1420,"height":800,"src":"/image-h.png","srcSet":"/image-h.png 1x"}},"publicURL":"/image-h.png"},
        {"backgImageEnabled": true, "caption":"Vertical Image","name":"/image-v.png","order":2,"base":"/image-v.png","childImageSharp":{"resize":{"originalName":"/image-v.png","src":"/image-v.png"},"fluid":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","aspectRatio":0.565,"src":"/image-v.png","srcSet":"/image-v.png 113w,\n/image-v.png 225w,\n/image-v.png 451w,\n/image-v.png 676w,\n/image-v.png 902w,\n/image-v.png 1082w","sizes":"(max-width: 451px) 100vw, 451px"},"fixed":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","width":451,"height":800,"src":"/image-v.png","srcSet":"/image-v.png 1x,\n/image-v.png 1.5x,\n/image-v.png 2x"}},"publicURL":"v.png"}
      ]}
      maskColor="rgba(255,255,255,0.75)"
      textColor="#000000"
    />
  </Story>
</Preview>
